content:
There is a new element isModifierReason see GF#13065 for details. Bottom line is that for the following resources you will need to update your spreadsheets with a new column 'Modifier Reason' and supply a reason. I'll send you all a tracker as an extra reminder.

affected elements sorted by WG:

CD Missing IsModifierReason on ActivityDefinition.doNotPerform

FI Missing IsModifierReason on DomainResource.modifierExtension
FI Missing IsModifierReason on List.entry.deleted
FI Missing IsModifierReason on List.mode
FI Missing IsModifierReason on OperationOutcome.issue.severity
FI Missing IsModifierReason on Questionnaire.item.enableWhen
FI Missing IsModifierReason on Resource.implicitRules

FM Missing IsModifierReason on Consent.scope

PA Missing IsModifierReason on Group.characteristic.exclude
PA Missing IsModifierReason on Patient.animal
PA Missing IsModifierReason on Patient.deceased[x]
PA Missing IsModifierReason on Patient.link

PC Missing IsModifierReason on AdverseEvent.actuality
PC Missing IsModifierReason on AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus
PC Missing IsModifierReason on CarePlan.activity.detail.prohibited
PC Missing IsModifierReason on CarePlan.intent
PC Missing IsModifierReason on Condition.clinicalStatus
PC (tracker to remove Missing IsModifier) on CarePlan.activity.detail.status

PH Missing IsModifierReason on Immunization.isPotent
PH Missing IsModifierReason on ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastStatus
PH Missing IsModifierReason on Medication.amount
PH Missing IsModifierReason on MedicationRequest.substitution.allowed

SD Missing IsModifierReason on Composition.confidentiality
SD Missing IsModifierReason on Composition.section.mode
SD Missing IsModifierReason on DocumentReference.relatesTo

VO Missing IsModifierReason on ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence
VO Missing IsModifierReason on ValueSet.compose.include.filter
@Eric Haas CBCC owns Consent, not FM --> GF#15581 reassigned to CBCC/P @David Pyke
I also created a new tracker item for 2 of the items assigned to PH that should have been Pharmacy
probable conflated PH with public health and pharmacy
Eric GF#15580 seems to be incorrectly assigned to StructDocs. They already have GF#15508. I reassigned it to FHIR-I
